attacks.name: Sleep Inducer
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch. The new Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Quick Blow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
